text: Sered nykh ye ti, yaki slukhayutʹ tebe, ale My poklaly na sertsya yikhni pokrovy, shchob vony ne rozumily [Koranu], a yikhni vukha zrobyly hlukhymy. I khoch by vony pobachyly vsi znamennya, to ne uviruyutʹ u nykh. I koly vony prykhodyatʹ do tebe sperechatysya, to hovoryatʹ ti, yaki ne viruyutʹ: «Voistynu, tse lyshe kazky davnikh narodiv!»
